description:
Meet the more sophisticated side of Cody Cummings The tea sipping, book reading nerd-hunk side of the Italian Stallion. He'll be your host for today's scene where you'll see Cody yank on his mammoth cock while he sips his earl grey and reads his hardcover. When he decides that his drink needs cream in it, he gracefully cums all over the plate, obviously missing the intended drink.

Enjoy!
title: Coffee And Cum
